description:
The quality of a shop stand and the packability of a home stand together add up to this deluxe version. Foldable legs make is storable and saves space between repair jobs.

  • Height adjusts from 55–72in
  • Clamp rotates 360 degrees to lock your bike in any position
  • Micro-adjustable clamp width is 7cm (2.75in.) and accepts tubes from 23–76mm diameter, including aero tubes
  • Channels in the clamp to relieve pressure on cable routing
  • Base, unfolded is 67 x 71cm
  • Max load is 45kg, with weight centered over legs
name: Park Tool PCS-4-2 Deluxe Home Mechanic Repair Stand
